meanings.definition: A small compact particle of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The sugar granules dissolved quickly in the hot tea.
meanings.sent2: She sprinkled salt granules on the popcorn for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid acorns in the granules of the sandbox.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky looked like tiny granules of light.
meanings.sent5: The colorful granules of sand sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The granules of sand stuck to his wet feet at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The granules of sugar added sweetness to the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The artist used tiny granules of glitter to create a sparkling effect.
meanings.sent4: The granules of rice bounced off the plate when it fell.
meanings.sent5: The granules of salt enhanced the flavor of the soup.
